name: Hyatt Regency Suites Atlanta Northwest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were lucky enough to get this hotel on Priceline and couldn't be happier. Great location, huge room - it was perfect!
reviews.title: Very, Very Nice!

reviews.text: Nice Hotel. Close to the Interstate.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel in a GREAT LOCATION

reviews.text: Checkin was flawless. Staff was very good.
reviews.title: Comfortable and Consistent Quality

reviews.text: Room was fantastic. Really two parts to the room. Sitting area with desk, sofa and chair, TV, Dining Table, and Mini Kitchen with Microwave.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bedroom had chair, comfortable bed, TV, Desk, and nice bathroom.
reviews.title: Good location and room for the price!
Outdated All Suites Hotel at a Fair Value
reviews.text: Finding an all suites Hyatt is a rare find these days. I stayed here on business, and appreciated some of the hotel features. Among them are the size of the rooms. Very spacious given that you have a two room suite. Two TV's, telephones and the kitchennete area are nice features to have. The rooms were not that quiet as you could hear hallway noises and other movements from neighboring rooms. I also ventured into the restaurant to sample the breakfast offering. The meal was good and I liked the grits offered.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is in a good need of a refresh! Hopefully, Hyatt has plans to do so soon. Its a bit dated and cleanliness is a bit suspect. I'm probably at the ceiling of what I'd be willing to pay to stay at this place. Keep the rates low until the renovations are completed.
reviews.title: It was ok

likes.liked: — Comfy Bed - good price for the wedding.

reviews.text: We were here for a wedding and the reception was in a tent off of the hotel. The reception was wonderful! Our room was ok. The hotel is older and could do with some updating. My biggest problem was the paper thin walls. We heard everything in the hallways and I could hear our neighbor peeing! You can also hear the airplanes going over. We were there just in time for the airshow as well. That was fun to wake up to! VOOM! VOOM!!
reviews.title: Good experience; would definitely return

likes.liked: — Clean, spacious suite with good view, comfortable bed. Quiet rooms.
likes.disliked: — No in-room safe; very minor problem.

reviews.text: The front staff was great. We took the red eye and got in at 6:30am. They said they would call us when they had a room for us which they did at 9:00am. In the middle of the night some people where yelling at 2:00 and then 4:30 in the morning. We found out later the hotel kicked them out. Thank goodness! Housekeeping never left us any shampoo or changed any of the glasses.
reviews.title: Nice, but can be costly

reviews.text: The bed were comfy and my boyfriend liked the spaciousness of the room. Our room had a sitting area along with a bedroom separated by a door. There was a small kitchenette with a sink, fridge, and microwave.
reviews.title: Very very nice!

likes.liked: — Location off of the highway, big rooms, modern decor

reviews.text: We stayed here as the halfway point from our trip from Florida to Indiana. I used Priceline and bid $50 for the room. All of the rooms are suites, which was perfect, as there were three of us. The rooms were clean and very fancy looking and the staff was very friendly and helpful. I was disappointed the the internet cost $10/24 hours and self parking was $6/day, but I know it could've been worse. The hotel is very easy to get to, just a short distance off of I-75, but far enough away that you don't hear highway noise. There is a Starbucks and Chik-fil-a on the other side of the highway, and the mall and shopping areas are less than 10 minutes away.
reviews.title: Great stay - not a thing wrong!

reviews.text: We just got back from this hotel. Allison was terrific can not say enough. One clerk though could hardly speak english and could not understand simple requests- Do you have disposable forks and knives. Throw away forks and knives. Needs to find another position not at the front desk. Family reunion was going on and except for their Blarring Sunday service, the trip was very nice.
reviews.title: Very nice rooms. Great price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Highly recommended hotel near the commercial hub of Cobb County and I-285/I-75. Rooms are suite style and very comfortable with a nice sitting area and wet bar. The bed was very comfortable. The bathroom is a little worn and could probably use a little updating very soon to keep up with Hyatt's standards. But other than that, we enjoyed the stay and found it be as good as any suburban Hyatt we have ever stayed at.
reviews.title: Very Comfortable Rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel was very nice and staff was really friendly. Didn't like that we had to pay for parking but it was only $6.00 for 24hr so it wasn't too bad. Room service was delightful and the stay fit gym was amazing. The bed was extremely comfortable but the room got cold quite a bit. Also there was only one elevator working but it didn't take too long to get to the rooms because the elevator that was working could be compared to speedy gonzalez.. But in general it was a wonderful place to stay...GREAT LOCATION!!!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I love the quality of the room. For the price we paid, we know we got a great deal. will definitely brag about it to our friends and recommend it.
reviews.title: exceptional

reviews.text: I just got through reviewing another property in this area (Marietta), and I was not kind to it (not that I trashed it, because it wasn't bad). This hotel is one of the reasons that I was so hard on the other one. My company has their HQ within a few miles of this location, so I end up staying in the vicinity a lot, and the Hyatt Suites is a stand out. I'm not surprised that it's listed as #1. Although it's starting to show it's age a little bit (they still haven't upgraded to flat screen TV's, and there are a few dings here and there), the maintenance and attention to details, as well as the quality of their customer service still make it a stand out. This really was apparent to me on this stay (I'm here now), because I transferred from another major chain 3* property to the Hyatt and the difference was like - wow! All suites (as the name would suggest), nice pool area, outstanding fitness center (the chilled towels are a nice touch). I the interest of fairness, I will point out a couple of caveats: They charge - $6/day, I think - for parking (this doesn't apply to me, because my company has a relationship with them). Also, they charge &9.95/day for internet (again, doesn't apply to me - this time I'm not sure if it's because of my corporate affiliation or the fact that I'm a Diamond member - probably the company thing. I know that my Diamond status gets me free breakfast buffet coupons. All in all, if it we're for the fact that there is another fantastic hotel a few blocks from this one (you can actually see the sign from their front entrance); I wouldn't hesitate giving this one my top pick. As it is, it's a toss up, but that said you'd be a winner regardless of which one you chose. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in an Area with Several Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For us, the location was ideal. We came down I-75 from the north, and this hotel is directly off the highway, just NW of the circle freeway. That was perfect for us as we never had to deal with the traffic at rush hour. Went downtown twice for Braves game, Coca-Cola museum, etc., but was able to plan that around heavy traffic times, and it was never an issue. Just a quick 20 drive down I-75.
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: The hotel is surrounded by restaurants/shopping/etc. The pizza place next door, Mellow Mushroom, is fabulous. They have about 8-10 beers on tap too, if that's your thing.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: The hotel itself was decorated very nicely. Everyone there was nice enough. The rooms are huge - I believe they are all suites (multiple rooms plus fridge, microwave, etc.). I did not eat at the restaurant there, but it looked nice.
reviews.title: Clean, professional staff, room was huge!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Negatives: My bed was extremely hard, and I'm not a fan of hard beds. The a/c was quite loud. Actually, it really wasn't the a/c, rather the vent cover that the a/c was blowing through that kept shaking and rattling. Parking is up to $6.00 at day. I'm guessing that is because they sell so many rooms on Priceline for next to nothing, that they have to make money somehow. It's just unfortunate because the pay lot is directly in front of the hotel and there are no other large businesses nearby that would steal the spots, so paying is really not warranted.
reviews.title: Very nice (except bathroom)

aka: Hyatt Regency Suites Atlanta Northwest Hotel Marietta
description: Witness the reinvention of Marietta’s finest full-service, all-suites hotel. The multi-million dollar transformation of the Hyatt Regency Suites Atlanta NW hotel has unveiled a significant refresh of its atrium lobby, restaurant, lounge, guestroom-suites, landscaping and front entrance. Welcome to the transformation.Settle into the most spacious and comfortable choice of Marietta Georgia hotels. Hyatt Regency Suites Atlanta Northwest offers all you need for a successful stay – extra-large suites with separate work areas, delicious dining, flexible meeting space and the latest wireless technology. Conveniently located off I-75, this newly renovated Marietta hotel puts you in the heart of the NW business center and just minutes from Buckhead, downtown and shopping. Reward yourself with the service and quality only this Hyatt Atlanta suites hotel can deliver.
